amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce all funding by one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make an across-the-board cut by 1%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 341 (Roll no. 378).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hefley.
